meanings.definition: Tending to see the worst aspect of things or believe that the worst will happen.
meanings.sent1: She had a pessimistic view of the outcome.
meanings.sent2: His pessimistic attitude made him expect the worst.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pessimistic nature, he still found reasons to smile.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered, reflecting his pessimistic mood.
meanings.sent5: Her pessimistic outlook colored everything she saw.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of hope or confidence in the future.
meanings.sent1: Their pessimistic expressions revealed their doubts.
meanings.sent2: The student's pessimistic behavior hinted at his lack of faith.
meanings.sent3: Even the sunniest day couldn't lift his pessimistic spirits.
meanings.sent4: The wilted flowers mirrored her pessimistic feelings.
meanings.sent5: His pessimistic demeanor cast a shadow over the room.
